section.p: Aardwolf USA is recognized as a leader in wholesale material handling solutions and lifting equipment, renowned for its exceptional quality, innovation, and outstanding service. With a strong reputation and an extensive network of distributors across America, Aardwolf continues to expand rapidly, setting new benchmarks in the industry. Our company serves diverse sectors, including stone, glass, construction, moving services, showcasing adaptability and a commitment to meeting the dynamic needs of various markets.

In 1980, James Corbett, a visionary entrepreneur, owned two manufacturing companies in Australia that served the stone industry, employing a team of around 100 dedicated individuals. Faced with the challenge of finding an efficient way to lift heavy objects, James had a groundbreaking idea that would change the industry forever. In a moment of brilliance, he invented a clamp for lifting marble and granite—an innovation so impactful that it earned him a patent in early 1995.
James took the next bold step in 2002, establishing a factory in Vietnam to bring his revolutionary products, such as Slab Lifting Clamps, to a global audience. While the Aardwolf Slab Lifting Clamps remain the foundation of James's success, the company has expanded its horizons, offering a diverse range of material handling and lifting equipment that is celebrated and trusted worldwide.
Below is a glimpse into the remarkable history of the Aardwolf Lifting Clamps—a legacy of transforming challenges into opportunities and redefining industries one solution at a time.
